articles.author: Zac Bowden
articles.title: The Windows PC is about to get GOOD, and you can thank Windows on Arm for that - Windows Central
articles.description: Microsoft will outline its vision for the future of Windows PCs on Monday, and Windows on Arm will be at the center.
articles.content: On Monday, Microsoft will unveil its vision for a new era of the Windows PC, consisting of new Arm-based silicon from Qualcomm and paired with next-gen AI experiences that will result in new Windows … [+4835 chars]
